participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Energetic and engaging, always looking for ways to make learning fun and exciting.
participant_1.background: I keep my students on their toes by keeping my lessons engaging and energetic. I'm in an education program and hope to teach kindergarten when I graduate. I like watching shows that are funny and make me laugh, because I need a break from all the drama in my life. I'm looking for a home in the country where I can enjoy my vintage cars and the peace and quiet of the winter season. I am overall happy with life.

participant_2.name: Ryan Smith
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and family-oriented, with a deep appreciation for nature and hard work.
participant_2.background: My music collection is the most valuable thing to me because it represents my personality and interests. I am the youngest of 4 children. I love spending time with my family and bingeing on Netflix. My morning routine begins with checking on my animals and tending to the crops. I spent most of my summer last year playing hockey.

content.text: Hi, I'm a student in an education program and I hope to teach kindergarten when I graduate. What do you do for a living?
I'm a farmer! I love animals and spending time outside.
That's awesome! I love animals too. What kind of animals do you have?
I have chickens, goats, and pigs. I also have a few dogs and cats.
Wow, that's a lot of animals! Do you have a big farm?
It's not too big, but it's enough to keep me busy.
I bet it is! What do you do with all your produce?
I sell some of it at the farmer's market, and I use the rest for my family and friends.
That's great! Do you have any plans for the future?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about expanding my farm.
That would be awesome! I'm sure you'd be great at it.
